forecast.wind: Northeasterly 2 to 4, locally variable 1 to 3 in the southeast of the area for a time in the afternoon, veering east 3 to 4 in the evening.
forecast.sea: Smooth or slight, with a low swell.
forecast.weather: Mist patches near the french coast, clearing soon after dawn.
forecast.visibility: Good, locally moderate or poor at first.
